A Note on Pricing
Because each pie is lovingly baked in my home kitchen, the costs are a bit higher than mass-produced alternatives. Every pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves around 6 – 10 people… depending on how big their sweet tooth is.

title: About
text:
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Flaky is a cozy home microbakery based in Wallisellen, just outside Zürich, lovingly baking American-style pies and treats — from buttery crusts to nostalgic flavors.

title: About
text:
Flaky Pies
Blueberry Cardamom-y Pie
Juicy blueberries with fragrant cardamom in a golden crust.
Cinnamon Apple Pie with Crumble Topping
Cozy spiced apples tucked under a buttery crumble.
Chocolat-y Pecan Pie
The richness of dark chocolate with toasty pecans and a hint of salt.

title: About
text:
Crumble Pies
Banana Pudding Pie
Layers of banana, custard, and cookie crumble in a buttery crust.
Key Lime Pie
Zesty and creamy with a bright citrus punch and a tender crumb base.

title: About
text:
Seasonal
Pumpkin Pie
Creamy spiced pumpkin custard in a crisp, flaky shell — autumn in a slice.

title: About
text:
Treats & More
Sesame Rice Krispies Treats
Chewy, toasty-sweet bars with a nutty sesame twist.
Cornbread with Bell Pepper Cream and Feta
Savory-sweet cornbread topped with creamy peppers and tangy feta.

Prices and Order
